actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Economic Stabilization Act in regard to the authority conferred by that section with respect to petroleum products.

summary.text: Directs the President to permit marketers of petroleum products a dollar-for-dollar passthrough for increases in the cost of such products.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Economic Stabilization Act in regard to the authority conferred by that section with respect to petroleum products.
